slide.title: WELCOME TO THE MUSIC BUILDING
slide.text: WELCOME TO THE MUSIC BUILDING School Floor Plan Getting Around UEA Student Hubs

slide.title: YOU ARE CURRENTLY ON FLOOR 0
slide.text: YOU ARE CURRENTLY ON FLOOR 0 Teaching rooms in the ARTS building are in a similar position but just on different floors. Turn around, go back into the lift lobby, then take the stairs or the lift and go to floor 2. When you exit the lift or the stairwell on floor 2 turn right and walk down the corridor. When you get to the next lift lobby turn right, and the teaching rooms are behind the double doors in front of you. The other teaching rooms in this building are on the 3 floors directly below these. There are also teaching rooms on floor 01 to the left of the 2 lifts. The ARTS Buildings (ARTS) Floor 1 – numbered 1.xx Floor 0 – numbered 0.xx HOME Floor Plans

slide.title: STARTING POINT
slide.text:
STARTING POINT Finding the other teaching rooms on campus will be easier if we start from a central point on campus. That location is the entrance to the ARTS 1 building, opposite the Blend Café.
From where you are standing, turn around, and take the stairs or the lift to floor 0. Exit the stairwell or lift and turn right. Walk through the doors into the student hub and continue through the doors at the opposite end. You are now in the main lobby of the ARTS 1 building and if you turn left you’ll be facing the build exit. Opposite you, is the Blend Café that looks like this.
The buttons below will guide you to the other buildings from this location. Lecture Theatre Block (LT1) Thomas Paine Study Centre (TPSC) Julian Study Centre (JSC) The Enterprise Centre (TEC) Elizabeth Fry Building (EFRY) Sportspark Earlham Hall (EH) Congregation Hall (CH) HOME

slide.title: LECTURE THEATRE BLOCK
slide.text:
LECTURE THEATRE BLOCK From your starting point (Music Building) to the Lecture Theatre block (and the Library)
Head up the stairs at the exit from the Music Building, continue up the first flight of stairs straight past the shops on your left and the SU Bar on your right. Continue through the square and walk up the stairs
From the bottom of the stairs at the exit from the ARTS 1 building (opposite Blend café), turn right, walk 20 meters and take the walkway towards the Library building.
Opposite the Library is the entrance to the lecture theatres (LT1, LT2, LT3, LT4). HOME BACK

slide.title: THOMAS PAINE STUDY CENTRE (TPSC)
slide.text:
THOMAS PAINE STUDY CENTRE (TPSC) From your starting point (Music Building) to the Thomas Paine Study Centre (TPSC)
Head up the stairs at the exit from the Music Building, continue up the first flight of stairs straight past the shops on your left and the SU Bar on your right. Continue through the square and walk up the stairs
From the bottom of the stairs at the exit from the ARTS 1 building (opposite Blend café), turn right, walk 20 meters and descend the short set of steps in front of you. Turn back on yourself and take the walkway to your left that travels under the ARTS 1 building.
Follow this walkway to the end and descend the steps.
At the bottom of the steps turn left and follow the main path alongside the road.
The Thomas Paine Study Centre is the first large white build you encounter on the right hand side. HOME BACK

slide.title: JULIAN STUDY CENTRE (JSC)
slide.text:
JULIAN STUDY CENTRE (JSC) From your starting point (Music Building) to the Julian Study Centre (JSC) Head up the stairs at the exit from the Music Building, continue up the first flight of stairs straight past the shops on your left and the SU Bar on your right. Continue through the square and walk up the stairs
From the bottom of the stairs at the exit from the ARTS 1 building (opposite Blend café), turn right, walk 20 meters and descend the short set of steps in front of you. Turn back on yourself and take the walkway to your left that travels under the ARTS 1 building.
Follow this walkway to the end and descend the steps. At the bottom of the steps turn left and follow the main path alongside the road.
Cross the road opposite the Thomas Paine Study Centre and turn left.
Continue past the Norwich Medical School and at the end of this building turn right and the entrance to the Julian Study Centre is in front of you. HOME BACK

slide.title: THE ENTERPRISE CENTRE (TEC)
slide.text:
THE ENTERPRISE CENTRE (TEC) From your starting point (Music Building) to the Enterprise Centre (TEC)
Head up the stairs at the exit from the Music Building, continue up the first flight of stairs straight past the shops on your left and the SU Bar on your right. Continue through the square and walk up the stairs
From the bottom of the stairs at the exit from the ARTS 1 building (opposite Blend café), turn left and walk up the stairs to the end of the ARTS 2 building. Turn left and walk between the ARTS 2 building and the square lawn.
Cross the pedestrian crossing and bear right behind the Security Lodge. Continue along this path – the Sportspark will be on your right. The next building on your left is the Enterprise Centre. It is very distinctive as it has straw panels covering the upper walls of the building. HOME BACK

slide.title: ELIZABETH FRY BUILDING (EFRY)
slide.text:
ELIZABETH FRY BUILDING (EFRY) From your starting point (Mediasuite) to the Elizabeth Fry Building (EFRY)
Head up the stairs at the exit from the Music Building, continue up the first flight of stairs straight past the shops on your left and the SU Bar on your right. Continue through the square and walk up the stairs
From the bottom of the stairs at the exit from the ARTS 1 building (opposite Blend café), turn right, walk 20 meters and descend the short set of steps in front of you. Turn back on yourself and take the walkway to your left that travels under the ARTS 1 building.
Follow this walkway to the end and descend the steps. At the bottom of the steps turn left and follow the main path alongside the road.
Continue past the ZICER building, and the Lawrence Stenhouse Building, until you reach the Elizabeth Fry Building. The lecture theatres in this building are at the rear of the building (Efry 01.02, 01.05, 01.08) HOME BACK

slide.title: SPORTSPARK (SP)
slide.text:
SPORTSPARK (SP) From your starting point (Mediasuite) to the Sportspark (SP)
Head up the stairs at the exit from the Music Building, continue up the first flight of stairs straight past the shops on your left and the SU Bar on your right. Continue through the square and walk up the stairs
From the bottom of the stairs at the exit from the ARTS 1 building (opposite Blend café), turn left and walk up the stairs to the end of the ARTS 2 building. Turn left and walk between the ARTS 2 building and the square lawn.
Cross the pedestrian crossing and bear right behind the Security Lodge. Continue along this path and the Sportspark will be on your right. HOME BACK

slide.title: EARLHAM HALL (EH)
slide.text:
EARLHAM HALL (EH) From your starting point (Mediasuite) to the Earlham Hall (EH)
Head up the stairs at the exit from the Music Building, continue up the first flight of stairs straight past the shops on your left and the SU Bar on your right. Continue through the square and walk up the stairs
From the bottom of the stairs at the exit from the ARTS 1 building (opposite Blend café), turn left and walk up the stairs to the end of the ARTS 2 building. Turn left and walk between the ARTS 2 building and the square lawn.
Cross the pedestrian crossing and bear right behind the Security Lodge. Continue along this path – the Sportspark will be on your right. The next building on your left is the Enterprise Centre. It is very distinctive as it has straw panels covering the upper walls of the building.
Walk past this building and turn left so that the bike racks and car park are on your right. Continue down the path and Earlham Hall entrance will be in front of you.
HOME BACK

slide.title: CONGREGATION HALL (CHALL)
slide.text:
CONGREGATION HALL (CHALL) From your starting point (Mediasuite) to Congregation Hall (CHALL)
Head up the stairs at the exit from the Music Building, continue up the first flight of stairs straight past the shops on your left and the SU Bar on your right. Continue through the square and walk up the stairs
From the bottom of the stairs at the exit from the ARTS 1 building (opposite Blend café), turn left and walk along the walkway, keeping the Multifaith Centre on your right. Turn right immediately after the Multifaith Centre.
Cross the pedestrian crossing and bear right behind the Security Lodge. Continue along this path – the Sportspark will be on your right. The next building on your left is the Enterprise Centre. It is very distinctive as it has straw panels covering the upper walls of the building.
Walk along the top of the square and turn left when you reach the Union building in front of you. Follow the path around the corner and walk to the left up the short hill. As you reach the top of the hill, Congregation Hall is on your right. HOME BACK

slide.title: STUDENT HUB
slide.text:
STUDENT HUB Learning and Teaching Service (LTS)
Induction Programmes Registration Enrolment on modules Student, module and course records Attendance monitoring Timetabling and room booking Allocation of Advisers/Advisees Coursework submission, return and deadline extension requests Examinations, course tests and other assessments Regulations and Codes of Practice Placements Complaints and Appeals Disciplinary processes - including fitness for study/practice and misconduct procedures Notification of assessment marks, results and transcripts/diploma supplements Initial queries regarding the administration of matters concerning scholarships, bursaries, grants and council tax exemption
HOME
